Title: Relates to requiring records subject to discussion at an open meeting be made available at least 24 hours prior to such meeting
Summary: Requires certain public records, and any proposed resolution, rule, regulation, policy or amendments thereto scheduled to be discussed by a public body at an open meeting be made available to the public at least 24 hours prior to such meetings.
LawCode: Amd ยง103, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to requiring certain records which are the subject of a discussion conducted at an open meeting be made available to the public at least twenty-four hours prior thereto
